numbered_ace_sentences: 2. Football has the least number of coaches that are POC.
3. More than 50 percent of the football players are POC.
4. I wonder if this situation makes it harder for the players.
5. A coach cannot relate to a life challenge of a player if the coach does not share this challenge.
6. Some players have big life challenges outside the sport.
7. I think that some coaches cannot relate to these challenges.
8. This situation can discourage a future coach that is POC.
9. A future coach that is POC can coach athletes that are POC.
10. The peers of a future coach that is POC can be not POC.
11. If the peers of a coach are not POC, then the coach can face challenges as a pioneer in the profession.
12. The diversity of athletes in a sport should be close to the diversity of leaders of these athletes.
